welcome.title: OrderBook Reflex Trainer
welcome.instruction1: Watch multiple exchange order books updating in real-time
welcome.instruction2: Wait for the Entry Signal (flashing green borders + sound)
welcome.instruction3: Press Q when you spot the best bid (BID side, highest green price)
welcome.instruction4: Watch for the Exit Signal (flashing red borders + sound)
welcome.instruction5: Press P when you spot the best ask (ASK side, lowest red price)
welcome.instruction6: Track your reaction time and compete against yourself!
welcome.tip1: Focus on the Price column - it's what matters most
welcome.tip3: Best bid = highest green price across all exchanges
welcome.tip4: Best ask = lowest red price across all exchanges
welcome.tip5: Reaction times under 2 seconds are excellent!
